Wisdom: شَافِعُ الْخَلْقِ الْعَمَلُ بِالْحَقِّ وَلُزُومُ الصِّدْقِ
enWisdom: The interceder of mankind [on the Day of Reckoning] acting upon the right and adhering to the truth
One who acts upon the truth, gains [from it]
One who acts upon the truth, profits
One who acts upon the truth is saved
One who acts upon the truth becomes successful
